channel.description: Recent content in darkweb on Rahul Jha (~RJ722) Blog

item.title: Silk Road, Revolutions and Systems
item.description:
Today, I read the story of Silk Road about how a particular young idealist Ross Ulbricht, tired of chasing success the old school way, found his way around the darkweb1 to create an online bazaar for the trading of illicit materials, mainly drugs, which he named Silk Road.

The aim behind writing this blog post is to think out loud and try to gain insight into the oversights made by some of the most prominent revolutionaries in history.
